nodes.text: A'zabii was a man who was captured by the reconstituted Sith Empire along with his friend Herron on the moon of Nar Shaddaa after they became embroiled in a brawl. The pair believed they had been cheated in a game of cards, and the resultant fight ended with the death of an Imperial operative and several others wounded; the Empire captured the pair and took them to their prison facility A-77, where A'zabii and Herron were interrogated as to their true identities. The duo resisted the Imperial interrogation, and maintained that they did not know of the operative's identity.
